price: 29. Kaadu diggah anu Yalla kinniyo Yallak fuxxih keenik (malayka kinnuk) iyya num, toysa too num Jahannam girai kaa galatna, tonnaah daalimiinih yan mara (koros kinnuk) tamannah tan galtóh galatna.
arabic: ۞ وَمَن يَقُلۡ مِنۡهُمۡ إِنِّيٓ إِلَٰهٞ مِّن دُونِهِۦ فَذَٰلِكَ نَجۡزِيهِ جَهَنَّمَۚ كَذَٰلِكَ نَجۡزِي ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: waman yaqul min'hum innī ilāhun min dūnihi fadhālika najzīhi jahannama kadhālika najzī al-ẓālimīna
